Package adrenaline.network.rmi.server

Class RmiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.network.rmi.server.RmiServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class RmiServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class that implements a server that manages RMI connection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RmiServer​(MainServer server, int port)
      Creates the RMI server and make it listening on the given port

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isRunning()
      Checks if the server is up and running
      void run()
      Starts the RMI server by creating a RmiClientHandler to manage communication between clients and server and uploading it on the RMI registry

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • RmiServer

        public RmiServer​(MainServer server,
                 int port)
        Creates the RMI server and make it listening on the given port
        Parameters:
        server - is the main server which manage data
        port - is the port where the server is listening

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the RMI server by creating a RmiClientHandler to manage communication between clients and server and uploading it on the RMI registry
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Checks if the server is up and running
        Returns:
        true if the server is listening
